get.summary: This represents a milestone on a Facebook Page
get.description: This represents a milestone on a Facebook Page

parameters.name: created_time
parameters.description: The creation time of the milestone

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: The end time of the milestone. Page milestones have the same start and end time

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The Page that posted the milestone.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of a milestone event

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: The start time of the milestone

parameters.name: updated_time
parameters.description: The update time of the milestone

get.summary: The photos attached to a milestone on a Facebook Page
get.description: The photos attached to a milestone on a Facebook Page

post.summary: The photos attached to a milestone on a Facebook Page
post.description: The photos attached to a milestone on a Facebook Page

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The photo, encoded as form data. This field is required.
